code: import axios from"axios";import{PRODUCTS_FETCH,PRODUCT_FETCH,PRODUCT_CREATE,PRODUCT_UPDATE}from"./types";export var productFetch=function productFetch(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_AOI_URL+"/products/"+id).then(function(res){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_FETCH,payload:res.data});});};};export var productsFetch=function productsFetch(){return function(dispatch){axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_AOI_URL+"/products").then(function(res){dispatch({type:PRODUCTS_FETCH,payload:res.data});});};};export var productDelete=function productDelete(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete(process.env.REACT_APP_AOI_URL+"/products/"+id).then(function(_res){axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_AOI_URL+"/products").then(function(res){dispatch({type:PRODUCTS_FETCH,payload:res.data});});});};};export var productCreate=function productCreate(values){return function(dispatch){axios.post('http://localhost:3001/products',values).then(function(_res){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_CREATE});});};};export var productUpdate=function productUpdate(id,values){return function(dispatch){axios.put(process.env.REACT_APP_AOI_URL+"/products/"+id,values).then(function(_res){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_UPDATE});});};};
